entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
